New Records: Sri Lanka recorded their lowest T20 total, being dismissed for 77.
Key Match Events: South Africa beat Sri Lanka by six wickets with 22 balls to spare.
Anrich Nortje took four wickets for 7 runs, earning him the player of the match award.
Keshav Maharaj dismissed Hasaranga and Samarawickrama with consecutive balls.
Kagiso Rabada took 2 wickets for 21 runs.
Keshav Maharaj took 2 wickets for 22 runs.
Ottniel Baartman took 1 wicket for 9 runs from four overs.
David Miller hit the winning runs for South Africa.
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa captain Aiden Markram expressed satisfaction with the win but noted the challenges in batting on the tough wicket.
Sri Lanka captain Wanindu Hasaranga reflected on the decision to bat first and acknowledged the need for better batting performances in future games.
Anrich Nortje expressed happiness with his performance and the team's overall bowling effort.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on a bowler-friendly pitch in New York.
There were concerns about the quality of the pitch for future matches in the tournament.
